item.title: The Shadows That Linger
item.description: January 2020 - Present Released March 17, 2021 Programmer - Crimson Ink Games, Team Size 6 Download the game: https://crimson-ink-games-llc.itch.io/the-shadows-that-linger Can provide code on request About The Game Play as a medium named Ilana in this spooky mystery and solve your sister’s murder on behalf of her lingering shadow. With time running out before her restless spirit becomes lost in purgatory forever, converse with your newly acquainted in-laws to gather leads in tense dialogues, explore their picturesque estate, and use your crystal ball to peer into the realm of shadows and discover clues with spiritual connections.
